title: 12/03/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 12/03/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, McLovin reveals that he'll be leaving the show at the end of the year. Brady Quinn reacts to Notre Dame's hiring of Marcus Freeman. And Adam Carolla calls to share stories from replacing Howard Stern early in his career.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

On Today's Dan Patrick Show, McLovin reveals that he'll be leaving the show at the end of the year. Brady Quinn reacts to Notre Dame's hiring of Marcus Freeman. And Adam Carolla calls to share stories from replacing Howard Stern early in his career.
